AbilityTooltips.juggernaut_blade_fury:
For this build, it is recommended to go spin/stats until level 5. If you do this, you will have more stats, which means you can spin more in team fights. It is your main damage source early game.

Tip: You can attack while spinning if the target is immune to magic. (Buildings included.)
AbilityTooltips.juggernaut_healing_ward: Healing ward is good early at level 9 so that you and your team can push. It is not really required to level up until later because this build mostly focuses on chasing down people and being an unstoppable juggernaut.
AbilityTooltips.juggernaut_blade_dance: There is no need to get Critical strike early because it is unreliable, and the spin is consistent, and reliable damage. This is why you neglect the crit, and put points into stats so that you can spin more in early team fights.
AbilityTooltips.juggernaut_omni_slash: Not much to say here, just remember to use this when there are minimal creeps around. Heroes like Mirana can disjoint this skill with leap/fog abuse. Be careful when using your ultimate.
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: Stats early is just so that you can spin more in teamfights and have more sustain in lane.
